Mod.name: Combat Challenges
Mod.author: Nathan
Mod.description: A collection of combat based challenges.

Steam.title: Combat Challenges
Steam.description:
A collection of combat based challenges.
Full source code and Unity project are available here: https://github.com/Jundroo-SimplePlanes-ExampleMods/CombatChallenges

Level.name: Bandit Assault 2
Level.description: Bandit Assault got a whole lot harder. Destroy all 10 targets, including the destroyer!

Level.name: Bandit Assault 1
Level.description: Destroy all 4 tanks at Bandit Airport. Be careful, they have support and base defenses!

Level.name: Convoy Chaos: Maywar 1
Level.description: Ready to blow up some convoys? Several convoys are speeding through the desert and up to no good. Stop them before they reach their destination.

Level.name: Convoy Chaos: Maywar 2
Level.description: The chaos continues... More convoys to destroy and this time they may fight back!

Level.name: Seek&Destroy: Krakabloa 1
Level.description: Find and destroy all 4 tanks on the island. Your targeting system will not pick them up until you get close. Be careful, they may spot you first and they are not very friendly.

Level.name: Seek&Destroy: Krakabloa 2
Level.description: Find and destroy all 8 tanks on the island. Your targeting system will not pick them up until you get close. Be careful, they may spot you first and they are not very friendly.

Level.name: Seek&Destroy: Krakabloa 3
Level.description: Find and destroy all 12 tanks on the island. Your targeting system will not pick them up until you get close. Be careful, they may spot you first and they are not very friendly.

Level.name: Snowstone Base Assault 2
Level.description: The Snowstone mountain base has received some upgrades. Go destroy all enemy targets.

Level.name: Snowstone Base Assault 1
Level.description: The Snowstone mountain base has received some upgrades. Go destroy all enemy targets.

Level.name: USS Beast Assault 2
Level.description: An enemy aircraft carrier, the USS Beast, is passing by Krakabloa. Now is the chance to take it out. Go sink the carrier and its 3 destroyer escorts. Be careful, the 3 destroyers will attack on sight.

Level.name: USS Beast Assault 1
Level.description: An enemy aircraft carrier, the USS Beast, is passing by Krakabloa. Now is the chance to take it out. Go sink the carrier but beware its escorts. The 3 destroyers guarding it will attack on sight.
